text: Anaesthetic Technique Consider premed antacid & analgesia, careful glucose control & DVT prophylaxis. Self-position on operating table. Preoxygenate & intubate in ramped position +/- CPAP. Minimize induction to ventilation interval to avoid desaturation. Commence maintenance anaesthesia promptly. Tracheal intubation is recommended. Avoid spontaneous ventilation. Use PEEP. Use short-acting agents e.g. desflurane or propofol infusion, short-acting opioids, multimodal analgesia. PONV prophylaxis. Ensure full NMB reversal. Extubate and recover in head up position.
